page.title: 10North of M20, Willesborough
page.content: Industrial area of north Willesborough comprises several factories, the two largest being Batchelors, a food processing firm, and P.P.F.(Proprietary Perfumes and Flavours) Ltd., which produces perfumes and flavours for various products. To the north-east side of this industrial area is Brett's Gravel Quarries, where sand and gravel are quarried . This sand forms a ridge which lies north-west to south-east across the valley and forms a ridge on which Lord's and Sweet Willow woods stand. A woodland area of mainly Sweet Chestnut and Silver Birch, it is both coppiced and naturally forested. The surrounding area is agricultural and used for cereal crops, oil seed rape and a few hop gardens still survive.
